name: New Financial Planning Client (UK)
description: Complete process for taking on a new financial planning client from initial enquiry through to implementation and first review.

stages.name: Lead Management
stages.description: Initial contact and qualification of potential new clients

tasks.title: Send Introductory Email
tasks.description: Send manifesto, explainer documents, and Calendly booking link

tasks.title: Create Client Record in Ningi
tasks.description: Add client prospect to Ningi and set up fact find

tasks.title: Meeting #1: Intro Call (60-90mins)
tasks.description: Initial meeting covering objectives, risk, experience, and compliance

tasks.title: Send Follow-up Email
tasks.description: Send risk questionnaire and existing policies form

tasks.title: Set up WhatsApp Group
tasks.description: Create group with client, planner, and admin support

stages.name: Client Onboarding
stages.description: Complete client onboarding process including fact find and policy information gathering

tasks.title: Send Letters of Authority
tasks.description: Send LOAs for existing policies via Timeline App or Ningi

tasks.title: Add Policies to iO
tasks.description: Add existing policies to iO under 'plans'

tasks.title: Process Information Packs
tasks.description: Confirm receipt via WhatsApp and add plan details to iO

tasks.title: Liaise with Providers
tasks.description: Contact providers to fill in any missing policy information

tasks.title: Complete AssetMap and FinCalc
tasks.description: Tidy up AssetMap and populate FinCalc with 2-way integration

stages.name: Research & Analysis
stages.description: Comprehensive analysis of client's current position and research of suitable solutions

tasks.title: Create Initial Analysis Report
tasks.description: Prepare report with Asset Map, cash flow, and draft proposal

tasks.title: Create Loom Video
tasks.description: Record short video explaining the proposal

tasks.title: Research Existing Plans
tasks.description: Analyze current position against priorities and objectives

tasks.title: Protection Research
tasks.description: Use research tool to identify appropriate protection solutions

tasks.title: Pension & Investment Research
tasks.description: Generate illustrations, KFDs, and fund research

tasks.title: Create Suitability Report
tasks.description: Comprehensive report covering all recommendations

stages.name: Present Advice
stages.description: Present recommendations to client and obtain agreement to proceed

tasks.title: Meeting #2: Discuss Analysis (60mins)
tasks.description: Run through Initial Analysis Report and agree proposed plan

tasks.title: Send Suitability Report
tasks.description: Send formal report within one week of second meeting

tasks.title: Save Documents to Intelliflo
tasks.description: Upload all applicable documents and complete online fact-find

tasks.title: Respond to Client Questions
tasks.description: Address any follow-up questions from the client

stages.name: Implementation
stages.description: Execute the agreed recommendations and set up new plans

tasks.title: Send Implementation Forms
tasks.description: Send client agreement, fee agreement, privacy notice, and transfer forms

tasks.title: Set up New Plans
tasks.description: Create new plans electronically with Fundment

tasks.title: Update Intelliflo
tasks.description: Add new plan details, fees, and change status to 'submitted'

tasks.title: Keep Client Updated
tasks.description: Provide updates via WhatsApp or email throughout process

tasks.title: Portal Access Setup
tasks.description: Ensure client can log into new portal

stages.name: First Review Setup
stages.description: Set up ongoing client relationship and schedule first annual review

tasks.title: Create Annual Review Opportunity
tasks.description: Set up first Annual Planning Meeting in 12 months in Intelliflo

tasks.title: Add to Client Email List
tasks.description: Add client details to Google Sheet with review dates

tasks.title: Set up Automated Follow-up
tasks.description: Configure AC to send satisfaction email after 2 months
